languages.text: {n}Сияние, льющееся из визора Паскаля, слабеет. В его голос возвращаются статические шумы.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, техносоратники".
{n}The radiant light pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."
languages.original_text: {n}Сияние, льющееся из визора Паскаля, слабеет. В его голос возвращаются статические шумы.{/n} "Да будет прерван Цикл, техносоратники".

traits.locale_text: {n}The shining pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice.{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルのバイザーから降り注ぐ光が薄暗くなる。雑音がゆっくりと彼の声に戻った。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ、技術同胞よ」
languages.original_text: {n}The radiant light pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのバイザーから降り注ぐ光が薄暗くなる。雑音がゆっくりと彼の声に戻った。{/n}「サイクルを断ち切れ、技術同胞よ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡面甲的光芒变得越来越黯淡，他的声音中再次出现了静电的嘶嘶声。{/n}“让循环终止吧，我的技术伙伴们。”
languages.original_text: {n}The radiant light pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡面甲的光芒变得越来越黯淡，他的声音中再次出现了静电的嘶嘶声。{/n}“让循环终止吧，我的技术伙伴们。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das strahlende Leuchten aus Pasqals Visor wird schwächer. Ein Rauschen kehrt zurück in seine Stimme:{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde, Techkameraden."
languages.original_text: {n}The radiant light pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Leuchten aus Pasqals Visor wird schwächer. Ein Rauschen kehrt zurück in seine Stimme.{/n} "Auf dass der Zyklus nicht fortgesetzt werde, Techkameraden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La lueur radieuse émanant de la visière de Pasqal s'affaiblit, et des parasites brouillent à nouveau sa voix.{/n} « Que le cycle soit rompu, technoconfrères. »
languages.original_text: {n}The radiant light pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."

traits.locale_text: {n}La lueur émanant de la visière de Pasqal s'affaiblit, et des parasites brouillent à nouveau sa voix.{/n} « Que le cycle soit rompu, technoconfrères. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La radiante luz que emana del visor de Pasqal se atenúa, y su voz recupera el crepitar de la estática.{/n} «Que se interrumpa el Ciclo, tecnocamaradas».
languages.original_text: {n}The radiant light pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."

traits.locale_text: {n}El resplandor que emana del visor de Pasqal se atenúa,y su voz recupera el crepitar de la estática.{/n} «Que se interrumpa el Ciclo, tecnocamaradas».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın vizöründen taşan yoğun ışık kısılıyor, sesi yeniden cızırtılı çıkıyor.{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun tekno yoldaşlarım."
languages.original_text: {n}The radiant light pouring out of Pasqal's visor grows dimmer. Static creeps back into his voice:{/n} "Let the Cycle be discontinued, tech-comrades."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın vizöründen taşan yoğun ışık yavaş yavaş kısılıyor. Sesi yeniden cızırtılı hâle geliyor:{/n} "Döngü'nün süreği bozulsun tekno yoldaşlarım."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
